msg: Update the repository tutorial with a more complete introduction to embedding.

msg: Synchronization with the repo SPI and impl.

author: mcconnell
msg: Improve the InitialContext interface and impl by exposing an operation to create a builder as opposed to the factory.  This maintains the same benefits as before of isolating DefaultBuilder, but improves the interface usage because the builder also provides us with the constructed classloader.
